mn104:2.4: Vadhoyeva kho → vadhoyeveko (si, s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
mn104:2.5: nibbinnarūpā → nibbiṇṇarūpā (s1) | nibbindarūpā (s2, s3, km, pts1, mr)
mn104:3.1: vassaṃvuṭṭho → vassaṃ vuttho (bj, s1-3, km) | vassavuttho (pts1)
mn104:5.6: ca kho → santi ca kho (s1-3, km) | santi ca (mr)
mn104:7-11.4: micchādiṭṭhi → micchādiṭṭhī (bj, s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
mn104:16.6: Tassa kho → tassa kho evaṃ (si, s1-3, pts1)
mn104:17.13: Tassa kho → tassa kho evaṃ (s1-3, km, mr)
mn104:18.3: vuḍḍhataraṃ bhikkhuṃ → buḍḍhataro bhikkhu (bj, pts1) | vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu (s1-3, km)
